careers.title: Software Engineer
careers.description: Develops and maintains software applications using various programming languages and frameworks. Responsible for designing, coding, testing, and debugging software systems.

careers.title: Registered Nurse
careers.description: Provides patient care, administers medications, and assists doctors in medical procedures. Works in hospitals, clinics, and healthcare facilities.

careers.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
careers.description: Creates and manages digital marketing campaigns across various platforms. Analyzes market trends and customer behavior to optimize marketing strategies.

careers.title: Mechanical Engineer
careers.description: Designs, develops, and tests mechanical devices and systems. Works on projects ranging from small components to large industrial machinery.

careers.title: Graphic Designer
careers.description: Creates visual concepts and designs for various media including websites, advertisements, and print materials.

careers.title: Data Analyst
careers.description: Collects, processes, and analyzes data to help organizations make informed business decisions.

careers.title: Electrician
careers.description: Installs, maintains, and repairs electrical systems in residential, commercial, and industrial settings.

careers.title: Teacher
careers.description: Educates students in various subjects, creates lesson plans, and assesses student progress in educational institutions.

careers.title: Chef
careers.description: Plans menus, prepares food, and manages kitchen operations in restaurants, hotels, and other food service establishments.

careers.title: Financial Advisor
careers.description: Provides financial guidance to individuals and businesses, helping them make investment and financial planning decisions.
